Articles.Content:
My latest video project:

I got the idea for this on a regular landing where things ended up similar to this video. Then I thought to myself "hey, nailed it! I should make a video out of that!"

Then it took me about 10 crashes to be able to get it to work out right.

Moral of the story: Record everything, all the time!

"she's starting to shake!" ....

"she's starting to shimmy!" .....

"she's starting to shutter!" ......

"she's begining to crack up!" ....

, thats when I cracked up and burst out laughing. Now have to watch that flick again. Sipping on nostalgia is good for the soul. Thanks for the walk.
